array.quote: Look at the sky. We are not alone. The whole universe is friendly to us and conspires only to give the best to those who dream and work.
array.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

array.quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
array.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

array.quote: You are the CEO of your own life.
array.author: Anonymous

array.quote: History repeats itself, first as tragedy, second as farce.
array.author: Karl Marx
